abstract: Even a small uptick in sales of existing homes provided no apparent lift to stocks as traders closed the books on a year that many were happy to put behind them.
snippet: Even a small uptick in sales of existing homes provided no apparent lift to stocks as traders closed the books on a year that many were happy to put behind them.
lead_paragraph: In what was perhaps a fitting finish to an underwhelming year, the stock market closed down modestly on Monday.

headline.main: Markets Close Lower to End the Year
